title: Ping Issues
body: Alright so everyday between 4pm -12am my ping in game is crazy high. That being said when i run ping tests elsewhere my ping seems to be alright. So far i've run the Hextech Repair Tool and tried resetting my net. What do you guys think I should do to fix my issue?

replies.body:
Often when there are latency (ping) issues during specific hours, it's a result of network traffic rerouting by an ISP in order to mitigate network congestion. I'd like you to run a traceroute log during the problematic hours so we can get a good idea of what's going on.

I'd recommend running this with a network app called [WinMTR](http://winmtr.net/). Simply boot up the app, then plug in 104.160.131.1 into the host IP field and start the trace. After the trace has passed 5 minutes, export the results as text and paste them here.

Let me know if you run into issues with this.

It seems your latency jumps up to 167ms on the first hop outside your home network and continues to fluctuate to upwards of 538ms along your route to the server. It looks like this happens across most of Roadrunner's Network and backbone, so you'll definitely want to reach out to your tier 2 ISP tech support about this. 

When you reach out to them, let them know of the issues you observed and the hours it occurs, along with providing them this traceroute so they have full context as to what's going on. Let me know if you have any other questions about this.
